Stone_Mallet.help: Legacy of Earth summons a Stone Mallet from the very earth. Stone Mallet, deals moderate damage and can knock down foes.
Stone_Mallet.targetHelp: Legacy of Earth summons a Stone Mallet from the very earth. Stone Mallet, deals moderate damage and can knock down foes.

Animate_Stone.help: Earth and stone coalesce to form an incredibly tough entity that can attack your foes. The Animated Stone is not alive and is immune to Psionic damage. It is also virtually immune to Sleep, Immobilize, Disorient, and Hold effects. The entity will follow you for quite a while, and can be healed and buffed like any teammate. Recharge: Very Long
Animate_Stone.targetHelp: Earth and stone coalesce to form an incredibly tough entity that can attack your foes. The Animated Stone is not alive and is immune to Psionic damage. It is also virtually immune to Sleep, Immobilize, Disorient, and Hold effects. The entity will follow you for quite a while, and can be healed and buffed like any teammate. Recharge: Very Long

Propel_Boulder.help: The Family Boss can open up a portal and pull in a heavy object that her can then levitate and propel at foes!
Propel_Boulder.targetHelp: The Family Boss can open up a portal and pull in a heavy object that her can then levitate and propel at foes!

Stone_Armor.help: While this power is active, the Caster's skin becomes Stone. Stone Armor makes the Caster highly resistant to Smashing, Lethal, Energy and Negative Energy based attacks. They are less likely to land and affect the Legacy of Earth.
Stone_Armor.targetHelp: While this power is active, the Caster's skin becomes Stone. Stone Armor makes the Caster highly resistant to Smashing, Lethal, Energy and Negative Energy based attacks. They are less likely to land and affect the Legacy of Earth.

Resistance.help: Legacy of Earth are resistant to Smashing and Toxic Damage but vulnerable to Negative Energy.
Resistance.targetHelp: Legacy of Earth are resistant to Smashing and Toxic Damage but vulnerable to Negative Energy.

Heavy_Mallet.help: A more impressive form of Stone Mallet, the Heavy Mallet deals more damage, but is slower to swing. It has a greater chance of knocking down opponents. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

Fire_Imps.help: Summons 2 to 3 small Fire Imps to a targeted location. Fire Imps will viciously attack any nearby foes, but they only posses the most rudimentary instincts. Be sure to summon Fire Imps near the enemies you wish them to attack.
Fire_Imps.targetHelp: Summons 2 to 3 small Fire Imps to a targeted location. Fire Imps will viciously attack any nearby foes, but they only posses the most rudimentary instincts. Be sure to summon Fire Imps near the enemies you wish them to attack.

Fire_Imps.help: Summons 1 to 2 small Fire Imps to a targeted location. Fire Imps will viciously attack any nearby foes, but they only posses the most rudimentary instincts. Be sure to summon Fire Imps near the enemies you wish them to attack.
Fire_Imps.targetHelp: Summons 1 to 2 small Fire Imps to a targeted location. Fire Imps will viciously attack any nearby foes, but they only posses the most rudimentary instincts. Be sure to summon Fire Imps near the enemies you wish them to attack.

Champion_of_Light.help: You can construct a powerful entity composed of pure light. Although made of light, the Phantasm is tangible and has powerful Energy attacks. The Phantasm can also fly and summon duplicates of itself. The duplicates are intangible, and cannot be harmed. The duplicates' attacks deal illusory damage similar to that dealt by Spectral Wounds. Only the original Phantasm can be healed and buffed. Recharge: Very Long
Champion_of_Light.shortHelp: Summon Champion of Light: Ranged Moderate DAM (Energy)
Champion_of_Light.targetShortHelp: Summon Champion of Light: Ranged Moderate DAM (Energy)

Tornado.help: Conjures up a funnel cloud at a targeted location. The Tornado will chase down your foes, tossing them into the air and hurling them great distances. The victims are left Disoriented and with reduced Defense. The Tornado is a menacing sight, and can even cause panic among your foes. Recharge: Long
Tornado.shortHelp: Summon Tornado: PBAoE Minor DAM (Smash), Foe Knockback, Fear, Disorient
Tornado.targetHelp: You have been Disoriented by the Tornado.

Mesmerize.help: Mesmerize painfully assails a target with psychic energy, rendering him unconscious. The target will remain asleep for some time, but will awaken if attacked. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Mesmerize.targetHelp: You have been Mesmerized and cannot act.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.

messages.attackerHit: You Sleep {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} Sleeps you with their {PowerName}.

Psionic_Tornado.help: The Hero's Psionic Tornado continues to tear at your mind and slows your attack rate!
Psionic_Tornado.targetHelp: The Hero's Psionic Tornado continues to tear at your mind and slows your attack rate!

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage over time.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Psychic_Wail.help: Psychic Wail is a devastating Psionic attack that wracks the minds of all nearby foes. Those that survive will have a severely reduced attack rate and may be left Disoriented. This power leaves you drained of Endurance and unable to recover Endurance for
Psychic_Wail.shortHelp: Close (AoE), Extreme DMG(Psionic), Foe Disorient -Recharge, Self -Recovery
Psychic_Wail.targetHelp: The Psychic Wail has reduced your attack rate.
